body: African Lens is a project that seeks to tell the story of Africa through visual elements which captures the essence of everyday lives: "Content is contributed by you and photojournalists who travel across the continent."
original_body: African Lens is a project that seeks to tell the story of Africa through visual elements which captures the essence of everyday lives: "Content is contributed by you and photojournalists who travel across the continent."
title: Africa: Visual Representation of Africa
